scenario_text.value:
Wh-what are you all still doing here?! I...I
thought you’d be long gone by now.

Hey, we’re not about to run off while evil
monsters are attacking to try and get Miu!

No! That’s what we’ve been trying to tell
you!

Does...does that mean you’ll help defend Her
Majesty and her servants?

Her Majesty should still be in the castle.
She never came through here. Protect...her...

(I know I have a salve! If I use it, would
that mean saving Patamon?!)

(But what if I use it now and then Agumon or
one of the others needs one later?!)

(This is no time for me to be stingy with
salves!)

Hold on! I have some medicine for you. Where
are you most hurt?

Takuma! Right here! There’s a bad wound on
one of Patamon’s forelegs!

Got it! This may sting a bit, but bear with
me, okay?

(No, I shouldn’t use it now. I’d better save
it in case something goes wrong.)

I’m...fine... You need to...hurry to...Her
Majesty...and the others!

I promise you we’ll save everyone! Miu and
you and Biyomon too!

Please...go save Her Majesty and the others!
They should still be in the castle!
